meta.name: Configuration
meta.description: (NEW) Bot configuration commands (can only be used by server admins).

commands.name: djrole
commands.description: Change the DJ role for this server.

commands.name: prefix
commands.description: Change the bot's prefix for this server.

commands.name: 8ball
commands.description: Ask the 8-Ball any question.

commands.name: avatar
commands.description: Get the avatar of a certain user.
examples: `avatar @someone#1234` - Get someone's avatar based on their DiscordTag
`avatar someone` - Get someone's avatar based on their username/nickname

commands.name: beemovie
commands.description: Get a random quote from the Bee Movie script.
examples: `beemovie` - will return a random quote from the movie
`beemovie honey` - will return a random quote from the movie that contains the word "honey"

commands.name: bird
commands.description: Get a random picture, GIF, or video of a bird.

commands.name: bunny
commands.description: Get a random GIF of a dog.

commands.name: cat
commands.description: Get a random picture, GIF, or video of a cat.

commands.name: dice
commands.description: Roll a dice.

commands.name: dog
commands.description: Get a random picture, GIF, or video of a dog.

commands.name: exp
commands.description: Get your current experience level.

commands.name: flip
commands.description: Flip a coin or choose from items.

commands.name: h
commands.description: h

commands.name: hyphen
commands.description: Place the hyphen one word to the right in every [adjective]-ass [noun] sequence. https://xkcd.com/37
examples: `hyphen That is a big-ass cake` - will be turned into "That is a big ass-cake"

commands.name: minesweeper
commands.description: Play Minesweeper using Discord spoiler tags.
examples: `minesweeper 8 8 20` - Generate an 8x8 Minesweeper field with 20 mines
`minesweeper 8 8 20 1` - Generate the code for an 8x8 Minesweeper field with 20 mines

commands.name: piglin
commands.description: Barter with a Piglin!

commands.name: pony
commands.description: Get a random pony picture or GIF. Uses the Derpibooru search syntax: <https://derpibooru.org/search/syntax>

commands.name: reverse
commands.description: Get the reverse of a given string.

commands.name: ship
commands.description: Get the love compatibility of two people. The values must be separated by " x " or " and ".

commands.name: stalinsort
commands.description: Sort numbers using the O(n) Stalin Sort algorithm. Numbers must be separated by space.

commands.name: when
commands.description: When will a certain event happen? (pRNG)

meta.name: Interaction
meta.description: A set of commands that allows members to boop/hug/highfive each other.

commands.name: muteinteractions
commands.description: Mute interactions without disabling them.

meta.name: Moderation
meta.description: Useful moderation commands like ban/kick and purge.

commands.name: ban
commands.description: Ban a member.

commands.name: kick
commands.description: Kick a member.

commands.name: purge
commands.description: Purge the last `n` (2-100) messages.

commands.name: purgefrom
commands.description: Purge messages starting from a given message ID.

meta.name: Todo
meta.description: Commands that allow you to use Thimble Bot as a todo manager.

commands.name: .todo add
commands.description: Add something to your todo list.

commands.name: .todo delete
commands.description: Remove todo.

commands.name: .todo list
commands.description: List all your todos.

commands.name: .todo done
commands.description: Toggle a todo state.

commands.name: ascii
commands.description: Convert text to ASCII.
examples: `ascii hello` - will print "hello" using figlet's Big font

commands.name: emoji
commands.description: Get the full-size version of an emoji/emote.

commands.name: emoteadd
commands.description: Add an emote to the guild.
examples: `addemote thonk` (+ attached image) - Will upload the attached image as an emot called "thonk"

commands.name: emotedelete
commands.description: Delete an emote.

commands.name: guild
commands.description: Get some information about the current server.

commands.name: lmgtfy
commands.description: Generate a "Let Me Google That For You" link.

commands.name: poll
commands.description: Create reaction-based polls.

commands.name: user
commands.description: Get some basic information about the specified user.
examples: `user @someone#1234` - Retrieve the information based on a DiscordTag
`user someone` - Retrieve the information based on a username/nickname
`user` - Retrieve information about your own account
